Pixel Gun 3D: PC Edition is what happens when someone looks at Minecraft and says:

> ‚ÄúCool blocks. Needs more bullets, battle passes, and 47 currencies.‚Äù

It‚Äôs a blocky online FPS where everyone is either:

* Level 5 with starter gear
* Or a neon demon with a rocket minigun, wings, a pet dragon, and Wi-Fi straight from heaven

There is no middle class.

---

### Pros

* **Stupidly accessible chaos**
  Boot up, pick a gun, spawn in, instantly get 360‚Äôd by a cube in a hoodie.

* **Weapon variety is insane**

  * Shotguns
  * Snipers
  * Laser rifles
  * Stuff that looks like it was designed by a 9-year-old with sugar and no supervision
    If it can shoot, explode, zap, or erase your dignity, it‚Äôs here.

* **Game modes for every brain mood**

  * Deathmatch
  * Team fight
  * Battle royale
  * Duels
  * Probably ‚Äústare at each other menacingly in a blocky corridor‚Äù somewhere in there too.

* **Movement**

  * Double jumps, gadgets, vertical maps
  * Half the lobby is on the ground
  * The other half is in the stratosphere raining chaos

* **Peak ‚Äúturn brain off and pew pew‚Äù game**
  Perfect for when you‚Äôre done being a responsible adult and just want to be a square with a gun.

---

### Cons

* Balance is‚Ä¶ a suggestion.

  * You: ‚ÄúI have a cute little rifle :D‚Äù
  * Enemy: pulls out a gun that shoots miniature suns

* Matchmaking sometimes looks like this:

  * You (PC, keyboard, trying your best)
  * Three mobile veterans with god-tier aim and anime clan tags

* The number of upgrades, skins, gadgets, parts, modules, and currencies will make your wallet nervous even if you never spend a cent.

* You will die to weapons you didn‚Äôt even see, from angles that don‚Äôt make sense, and just accept it as ‚ÄúPixel Gun moment.‚Äù

---

### Peak Pixel Gun Moments

* Spawning, taking two steps, immediately exploding from a weapon that sounds like a microwave transforming into a jet engine.

* Getting a killstreak and feeling unstoppable‚Ä¶ then walking around a corner into a guy with a one-shot hallway vacuum gun.

* Unlocking a new weapon, reading the description like ‚Äúhuh, that seems busted,‚Äù then getting shredded by a *better* busted gun 0.3 seconds later.

* Joining ‚Äúfun casual match,‚Äù leaving emotionally damaged because a child called you trash while double-jumping over your corpse.

---

### Final Verdict

It‚Äôs loud, colorful, unbalanced, monetized, and absolutely unashamed about any of it.
But it‚Äôs also‚Ä¶ fun. Like, *annoyingly* fun.

**8.5/10**
Would once again queue in with my sad little starter loadout, get vaporized by a glowing pay-to-flex cannon, and still hit ‚ÄúPlay Again‚Äù because the cubes go pew and my brain likes it.

In team mode, more often there are players that will wipe your team single-handedly 2-3 times and you can only win if your entire team of peasants(including me/you) gang up on them and since its a team mode, the opposite team players wont sit by and watch, so you only get a big D in such match, D as in Defeat...
 
Last but not least I have found myself pumping several magazines of bullet in opponents trying to laboriously whittle their health and them missing most shots and then one hit ends it all...
Well, On a side note, You can indeed enjoy the game but, only after reaching higher levels and upgrading only some selected weapons as gold coins for upgrading weapons are high in requirement but are rewarded very pitifully when you win a match, so earning enough amount for upgrading can only be earned after hours of deaths, 100s of wins and game plays. 

Conclusion, If you don't engage in micro transactions, Then this game will provide you with a cocktail of concentrated frustration and occasional entertainment. If you want to enjoy the game, then don't get curious about all weapons, select a few, stick to them, upgrade them as much as you can, have a very high skill level to hit your enemies with most shots and pray that your enemy doesn't hit you enough with his shots and be ready for eternal grind lol.

For me, This game is less of an enjoyment, rather is just a game where I am trying to 100% all achievements, after that I will uninstall and never visit again.
